name: register-dicoms
description: Processing container for registering dicom images

inputs.name: nrrd
inputs.description: Expects a subdirectory per image with a single .nrrd file. Directory names must match with <reference> channel.

inputs.name: reference
inputs.description: Expects a subdirectory per subdirectory in <nrrd> chanel with the reference dicom image. Directory names must match with <nrrd> channel.
